comment: This professor does not actually teach the material, you teach yourself everything. Textbook is pretty much useless, tutoring center and youtube are more helpful. He also does not follow the dates he sets in his syllabus so it is a mystery when things are actually due until the week of.

Great professor to take online. The class is pretty difficult, but that comes along with taking a senior level class. There is a midterm, final, and about 6 labs in total, so if you bomb one, it will be really hard to make your grade back up. Professor provides plenty of information (video lectures, ppts, etc) to ensure you know the information.
